facts.fact: Normal body temperature for a cat is 102 degrees F.
Cats have five toes on their front paws and four on the back, unless they are polydactyl.
Domestic cats can run at speeds of up to 30 mph.
A group of cats is called a clowder.
Cats can make over 100 different sounds.
The oldest recorded pet cat lived to be 38 years old.
Adult cats only meow to communicate with humans.
Cats sleep for 70% of their lives.
The largest breed of domestic cat is the Maine Coon.
Each side of a cat's face has about 12 whiskers.
A cat's nose is as unique as a human's fingerprint.
Cats have a third eyelid called a haw.
A cat's hearing is better than a dog's.
Cats can rotate their ears 180 degrees.
The first cat in space was a French cat named Felicette in 1963.
